name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Docs with Code: Link Source Code to Documentation, Java

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate to underlying source code for the documentation you are viewing!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Docs with Code adds a direct link to the source code of the documentation you are veiwing.
Currently, only Java API docs are supported. Support for other languages, libraries coming soon!

Steps to use the extension;
1. Just install the extension. Simple and easy, and no special permissions are needed!
2. Navigate to any supported sites for documentation, eg. https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/13/docs/api/java.base/java/util/AbstractList.html
3. While browsing the docs, look for external links next to the Classes, Interfaces, or Methods. These links will take you directly to the underlying or supporting source code.
